name: seneca-msg-test
description: Structured testing of seneca plugin messages.

scripts.test: lab -v -P test -L -t 80 -r console -o stdout -r html -o test/coverage.html -r lcov -o test/lcov.info
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm i && npm test
scripts.repo-tag: REPO_VERSION=`node -e "console.log(require('./package').version)"` && echo TAG: v$REPO_VERSION && git commit -a -m v$REPO_VERSION && git push && git tag v$REPO_VERSION && git push --tags;
scripts.repo-publish: npm run clean && npm i && npm run repo-publish-quick
scripts.repo-publish-quick: npm run prettier && npm run build && npm run test && npm run repo-tag && npm publish --registry http://registry.npmjs.org --access public

author: Richard Rodger richardrodger.com
